price: Rather, it will come upon them suddenly and stun them; they will not be able to avert it, nor will they be given respite.
arabic: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
